text: Joachim "Blacky" Fuchsberger (pronounced ; 11 March 1927 â€“ 11 September 2014) was a German-Australian actor, television host, lyricist and businessman. He was known for his roles in 08/15, Der Frosch mit der Maske, The Dead Eyes of London, The Black Abbott, and in Im Banne des Unheimlichen. Fuchsberger died from multiple organ failure at his German home on 11 September 2014, aged 87.TV-Legende: Joachim Fuchsberger ist tot (Spiegel Online, 11 September 2014) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German businesspeople Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian businesspeople Category:People from Stuttgart
